verses.text: \w Be|strong="H6440"\w* merciful \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w be|strong="H6440"\w* merciful \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul taketh refuge \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*: Yea, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* wings \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* take refuge, Until \add these\add* calamities \w be|strong="H6440"\w* overpast.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* cry \w unto|strong="H5674"\w* God Most High, \w Unto|strong="H5674"\w* God \w that|strong="H3588"\w* performeth \add all things\add* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7121"\w* send \w from|strong="H5921"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H7121"\w* save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \add When\add* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* would swallow \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* reproacheth; \qs [Selah\qs* God \w will|strong="H7121"\w* send \w forth|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* lovingkindness \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* truth.

\w My|strong="H7971"\w* soul \w is|strong="H2617"\w* among lions; \w I|strong="H7971"\w* lie among \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H8064"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* fire, Even \w the|strong="H7971"\w* sons \w of|strong="H8064"\w* men, whose teeth \w are|strong="H8064"\w* spears \w and|strong="H7971"\w* arrows, \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* tongue \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sharp sword.

\w Be|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H3956"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, above \w the|strong="H8432"\w* heavens; \add Let\add* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* glory \add be\add* above \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* prepared \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps; \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H5921"\w*: \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* digged \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* fallen \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst thereof \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*: \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* sing, yea, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* sing praises.

Awake up, \w my|strong="H3559"\w* glory; awake, psaltery \w and|strong="H3820"\w* harp: \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* awake \w right|strong="H3559"\w* early.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* give thanks \w unto|strong="H3519"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples: \w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* sing praises \w unto|strong="H3519"\w* thee among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w thy|strong="H3034"\w* lovingkindness \w is|strong="H5971"\w* great \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* heavens, \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w thy|strong="H3034"\w* truth \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* skies.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, above \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; \add Let\add* \w thy|strong="H8064"\w* glory \add be\add* above \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
